p.b: HELLO AND WELCOME TO OUR SURVEY!

THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR PARTICIPATION. THIS STUDY IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US AND WE ASK THAT YOU ANSWER EACH QUESTION CAREFULLY AND COMPLETELY. PLEASE REMEMBER THAT THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. WE ARE ONLY INTERESTED IN YOUR OPINIONS.
USE THE SCROLL BAR ON THE RIGHT AND BOTTOM OF YOUR SCREEN TO MOVE UP AND DOWN THROUGH QUESTIONS AND IMAGES.

number.label: hTTValue
number.title: Values

float.label: SegmentCal2
float.title: Calculation
float.exec: import math DENOM = 1 + (math.exp(SegmentCal.r1.val)) + (math.exp(SegmentCal.r2.val)) + (math.exp(SegmentCal.r3.val)) + (math.exp(SegmentCal.r4.val)) print(DENOM) SegmentCal2.val = DENOM

float.label: SegmentCal3
float.title: Calculation
float.exec: import math SegmentCal3.r1.val = (math.exp(SegmentCal.r1.val)) / SegmentCal2.val SegmentCal3.r2.val = (math.exp(SegmentCal.r2.val)) / SegmentCal2.val SegmentCal3.r3.val = (math.exp(SegmentCal.r3.val)) / SegmentCal2.val SegmentCal3.r4.val = (math.exp(SegmentCal.r4.val)) / SegmentCal2.val SegmentCal3.r5.val = 1 / SegmentCal2.val

radio.label: hfinalSeg
radio.title: final Segment
radio.exec: arr = [row.val for row in SegmentCal3.rows] hfinalSeg.val = arr.index(max(arr))

number.label: hTTValue1
number.title: Values

float.label: SegmentCal2a
float.title: Calculation
float.exec: import math DENOM = 1 + (math.exp(SegmentCala.r1.val)) + (math.exp(SegmentCala.r2.val)) + (math.exp(SegmentCala.r3.val)) + (math.exp(SegmentCala.r4.val)) print(DENOM) SegmentCal2a.val = DENOM

float.label: SegmentCal3a
float.title: Calculation
float.exec: import math SegmentCal3a.r1.val = (math.exp(SegmentCala.r1.val)) / SegmentCal2a.val SegmentCal3a.r2.val = (math.exp(SegmentCala.r2.val)) / SegmentCal2a.val SegmentCal3a.r3.val = (math.exp(SegmentCala.r3.val)) / SegmentCal2a.val SegmentCal3a.r4.val = (math.exp(SegmentCala.r4.val)) / SegmentCal2a.val SegmentCal3a.r5.val = 1 / SegmentCal2a.val

radio.label: hfinalSega
radio.title: final Segment
radio.exec: arr = [row.val for row in SegmentCal3a.rows] hfinalSega.val = arr.index(max(arr))
